hotelOwner.title: Hotel Owner Form
hotelOwner.name: Name
hotelOwner.validEmail: Please enter a valid email address
hotelOwner.fact1Example: Fact 1 – e.g. special highlight of your hotel, unique selling point
hotelOwner.fact2Example: Fact 1 – e.g. special highlight of your hotel, unique selling point
hotelOwner.fact3Example: Fact 1 – e.g. special highlight of your hotel, unique selling point
hotelOwner.fact4Example: Fact 1 – e.g. special highlight of your hotel, unique selling point
hotelOwner.fact5Example: Fact 1 – e.g. special highlight of your hotel, unique selling point
hotelOwner.imagesDescription: Please send us 3 pictures of your hotel. During the layout, 1 optimally suitable picture will be selected from these for your pages in the graphic.
hotelOwner.websiteImagesDescription: Please send us your pictures for the digital presentation on the 101-Website with the following specifications:
hotelOwner.formatValue: Landscape: min. 460 x 300 mm + 3mm bleed, Portrait: min. 230 x 300 mm + 3mm bleed
hotelOwner.copyrightNotice: Please note that the rights for the publication of images must be clarified with the respective author.
hotelOwner.copyrightAgreement: By submitting images for publication, you guarantee that you have the usage rights for publication in our book and on our website and at the same time grant us the right to use the images for the presentation of your hotel.
hotelOwner.copyrightCheckbox: I agree to the image copyright terms
hotelOwner.flagAttachment: Attachment (Attachment type, hemstitch available? If yes, please note size)
hotelOwner.copyrightInstruction: Please enter the photographer/author in the following field. If you do not name a photographer/author, we assume that you hold the complete image rights.
hotelOwner.photoCustomization: Customize the book cover with your hotel photo
hotelOwner.sendCoverPhoto: Please send us your cover photo
hotelOwner.preBookHotelImageDescription: Please send us 4 pictures of your hotel. During the layout, 2 optimally suitable pictures will be selected from these for your pages in the graphic.
hotelOwner.preBookHotelFormatValue:
Landscape: min. 460 x 300 mm + 3mm bleed
Portrait: min. 230 x 300 mm + 3mm bleed
hotelOwner.preWebsiteImagesDescription: Please send us your pictures for the digital presentation on the 101-Website with the following specifications:
hotelOwner.manageQuoteNameOrRole: Name and role of the quoting person
hotelOwner.interviewWithManager: Detailed interview with the General Manager / Owner
hotelOwner.question1: 1. You are reopening in December – what was the reason for the ',break'?
hotelOwner.question2: 2. What special experiences does the location at 2,000 meters above sea level offer?
hotelOwner.question3: 3. Is there an event that your guests should not miss?
hotelOwner.question4: 4. What importance does the culinary arts have in your establishment?
hotelOwner.question5: 5. What could you most easily do without in your daily operational work?
hotelOwner.question6: 6. If you had to choose: art gallery or live concert?
hotelOwner.exlBookHotelImageDescription: Please send us six images of your hotel. During the layout process, three images will be selected that are ideal for your graphic pages.
